kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: arguments[0].click(); By using argument: '<selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="2590f51aa35257172f32f4b549f5c7f3", element="f.D725ACEAB83C32646BFF380A107CE4A0.d.0AEE0EDE32B2E082B17E8374FA8ACE1D.e.353")>'
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//div[contains(text(), 'ทะเบียนรายการ ระดับที่ 1')]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
